amendment.description: Amendment sought to add a new section at the end of the bill providing that none of the funds in the bill may be used to enter into any new commercial agricultural lease on the Lower Klamath and Tule Lake National Wildlife Refuges in the States of Oregon and California that permits the growing of row crops or alfalfa.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new section at the end of the bill providing that none of the funds in the bill may be used to enter into any new commercial agricultural lease on the Lower Klamath and Tule Lake National Wildlife Refuges in the States of Oregon and California that permits the growing of row crops or alfalfa.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 201 - 223 (Roll no. 316).
